author: Michelle Brown
title: Louise tried to take her mother out of a nursing home, then coronavirus struck
description: Louise Payne believes her 89-year-old mother is in more danger at Sydney's Newmarch House aged-care facility than she would have been at home after the death of three residents from coronavirus.
content:
Updated 
April 22, 2020 10:41:49
The daughter of a resident at a Western Sydney aged care facility at the centre of a coronavirus outbreak says her mother is in a game of "Russian Roulette".
Key points:
